mapper.insert: insert into t_c_contract(contractname, contractnum, amount, durationtime, signtime, contractpartyb, remark, priority, status, isdisabled, operuser, operdate, subofficeid) values(#{contractName}, #{contractNum}, #{amount}, #{durationTime}, #{signTime}, #{contractPartyB}, #{remark}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{isDisabled}, #{operUser}, #{operDate}, #{subofficeId})

insert into t_c_contractexecute(contractid, monthamount, year, month, remark, priority, isdisabled, operuser, operdate) values(#{contractId}, #{monthamount}, #{year}, #{month}, #{remark}, #{priority}, #{isDisabled}, #{operUser}, #{operDate})
mapper.select:
select a.subofficename departStr,a.subofficeid,b.*,c.balanceTotalStr,c.payforTotalStr from (t_s_suboffice a left join (select su.subofficeid, sum(ct.amount) contractTotalStr,sum(sw.monthrealityinvest) thisMonthInvestStr, sum(sw.yearrealityinvest) thisYtmTotalStr,sum(sw.finishinvest) investTotalStr from t_s_subofficewrite sw,t_c_contract ct,t_s_suboffice su where sw.contractid = ct.contractid and su.subofficeid=ct.subofficeid and sw.isdisabled=0
and (sw.year = #{year} )
and (sw.month = #{month} )
group by su.subofficeid) b on a.subofficeid=b.subofficeid) left join (select aa.subofficeid, sum(case when aa.costtype='01' then aa.balanceTotalStr else 0 end) 'balanceTotalStr', sum(case when aa.costtype in ('02','03') then aa.balanceTotalStr else 0 end) 'payforTotalStr' from ( select subofficeid,costtype,sum(money) balanceTotalStr from t_f_financingwrite where costtype in (01,02,03)
and (writeyear = #{year} )
and (writemonth = #{month} )
group by subofficeid,costtype) aa ) c on a.subofficeid=c.subofficeid
